nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
## Data Preparation & File Selection
Retrieve and merge source data for quotes, video backgrounds, and music from Google Sheets and Google Drive; then randomly select one quote, one background video, and one music file.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Download Selected Video Background
nodes.notes: This googleDrive node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Download Selected Music Background
nodes.notes: This googleDrive node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Save Video Background Locally
nodes.notes: This readWriteFile node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Save Music Background Locally
nodes.notes: This readWriteFile node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Prepare Overlay Text (Quote & Author)
nodes.notes: This code node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Generate Final Video Clip

parameters.command: =ffmpeg -i {{ $('Save Video Background Locally').item.json.fileName }} -i {{ $('Save Music Background Locally').item.json.fileName }} -filter_complex "[0:v]scale=1080:1920:force_original_aspect_ratio=increase,crop=1080:1920[vid]; color=black@0.3:size=1080x1920:d=10[bg]; [vid][bg]overlay=shortest=1[bgvid]; [bgvid]{{ $json.drawText }}[outv]; [1:a]volume=0.8[aout]" -map "[outv]" -map "[aout]" -aspect 9:16 -c:v libx264 -c:a aac -shortest output.mp4 -y

nodes.notes: This executeCommand node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content:
## File Download & Video Processing
Download the selected files, write them to disk, prepare overlay text (quote and author), and generate the final video clip using FFmpeg.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note2

parameters.content:
## Video Upload & Post-Processing
Upload the final video to YouTube using the YouTube API and update your Google Sheets with upload statuses and YouTube links.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# AutoClip – Automatically Generate Video Clips and Upload to YouTube

## Overview
Automated workflow: AutoClip – Automatically Generate Video Clips and Upload to YouTube. This workflow integrates 11 different services: stickyNote, httpRequest, code, readWriteFile, merge. It contains 39 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 39
- **Node Types**: 11
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Start AutoClip Workflow**: manualTrigger
- **Retrieve Video Background Data**: googleSheets
- **Retrieve Quote Data**: googleSheets
- **List Video Background Files**: googleDrive
- **Configure Music Background Folder ID**: set
- **List Music Background Files**: googleDrive
- **Retrieve Music Background Data**: googleSheets
- **Merge File Selection Data**: merge
- **Select Random Video, Music & Quote**: code
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- ... and 29 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
